column4: Im really excited about Dumping windows. i swear its like this fat chick i married 30 years ago. that has been bitching at me to rub her feet every day since (Reference to take care of me: with Antivirus, upgrades"Software") And every time mentioning... you cant sirvive without me. your my bitch... Tho im only 21... i feel like im being treated like a cheap hooker by microsoft.
You mean like, I want to take a Supersized Cactus and Shup it up Bill Gates A**
